articles.title: Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Mongolia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Inaugurated in Mongolia 
    Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of a preparatory committee for the "Month of Celebrating the Sun of the 21st Century" was held by the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organization of Mongolia on Jan. 28.
 Ch. Surenjav, chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.    
 The committee set the period from February to April "Month of Celebrating the Sun of the 21st Century" and adopted a decision of holding colorful political and cultural functions in this period and discussed an action program.

articles.title: Celebration Meetings Held in Democratic Congo
Women's Solidarity Formed in S. Korea
Chairman of 12th -Term Hanchongryon Elected
articles.content:
Chairman of 12th -Term Hanchongryon Elected 
    Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Paek Jong Ho, chairman of the General Student Council of University of Foreign Studies, was elected chairman of the 12th -Term South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) at an extraordinary meeting of deputies to Hanchongryon held at Yonsei University in Seoul on Jan. 31, according to the south Korean KBS and MBC.
 At the press conference held at the end of the meeting, he said Hanchongryon would conduct diverse activities in the future including actions against the Grand National Party. Students would struggle as befitting members of Hanchongryon by inheriting the
history of the student movement, he stressed.

Reception Given at Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Given at Cuban Embassy
    Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Cuban Military Attache here Giraldo Abreu Morales hosted a reception at the embassy yesterday evening on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 Present on invitation were generals and officers of the Korean People's Army and officials concerned.
  Cuban Ambassador Esteban Lobaina Romero and embassy officials were on hand.
 Speeches were made there.
